website_summaries.verdict: A budget laptop that delivers excellent battery life and a thin design.are.
pros: Perfect for streaming video, as the battery can run for almost 6 hours of continuous video streaming
Includes a 15.6” full HD display screen
Has a hybrid hard drive with both SSD and HDD technology
12GB of RAM that’s easy to upgrade
cons: Does not have enough power or features to enable high-end gaming software

customer_reviews.title: Do bot buy the wrong one
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop. However some reviewers may be extremely misleading when presenting the product. I thought the i5 woth 1050nvidia card would have rgb backlit keys but thats not the case. Only the 1300$ will offer the backlit keys so dont buy the wrong one.
customer_reviews.author: James Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING LOW TEMPERATURE WHILE GAMING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, this laptop will run hot up to 90 degrees while gaming. BUT DO NOT BE DISAPPOINTED! HP Has put something in the new BIOS! 1. Go to the bios 2. UNDERVOLT the CPU down to 20 watts 3. Game on!!! My maximum CPU Temp is 75 degrees! AMAZING! While GPU is 68 degrees! This is the best value laptop in the market! Period. BEST LOOKING LAPTOP I EVER HAD. THIS IS MY THIRD GAMING LAPTOP!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: Love the laptop but the battery does drain fast and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the laptop but the battery does drain fast and the charger when charging heats up within 5 minutes. So i get to charge the laptop 5 minutes before i have to unplug it to cool down. Other than that the performance is A1 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: EricG24

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fast, stylish, easy to set up, crisps graphics, strong sound -- great laptop
customer_reviews.author: NY-Rangers-Fan-1

customer_reviews.title: Best experience I've had with buying a gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with speed of laptop, performance, overall best purchase I've made on a computer. Capable of running Guild Wars 2, World of Warcraft, FFXIV on max graphics with no lag. Will require elevated surface but have had no issue with laptop fans effectively cooling as long as it's not on a flat surface which would block airflow. Beautiful performance and no lagging.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Totally Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love my new laptop and I feel it is well worth the money. I don't see why anyone would complain about this laptop. I do all my music production on this laptop and sounds amazing. People read the specs before you buy and assume this will work perfect for you. I have had no problems with this computer and I am hooked
customer_reviews.author: TK78

customer_reviews.title: Poor keyboard life. Very disappointing for a gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my computer about a year now, and I have one major complaint. It's a gaming PC, so you know WSAD and the 4 arrow keys are going to get some SERIOUS use. Both sets are starting to fail. I'll be pushing/holding the key, and it will just randomly stop reading the pressure/push. Great fun when you're dodging that lethal body shot,... and now you're dead. For a gaming PC, I'd expect a longer key push life than under a year. In fact, I'd expect it to be 3+ years. Of course, it waited for the warranty to expire before starting to fail. That's quite a bit of money to have to buy/use a secondary keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: jtwalkerfv

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This laptop runs games great, however, there are some worrying flaws. Chief among them is that there seems to be a problem when it comes to internet connectivity. All other computers have strong connections, however, this one seems to have sporadic connection. It's not a problem with my router as other computers in the same room have strong, reliable connections. Careful when playing online games as you do get dropped a lot. If it were not for the connectivity problems then this would be a solid five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: This Omen laptop is worth the money, far out performs other more expensive laptops. Very fast (using cox high speed internet) and over all very functional. I had to get use to the keyboard being a gaming computer. A few different functions, but a very solid laptop. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage that consistently blue screens and crashes.  Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for two weeks now. Constantly crashes on me at least once per day. Blue screen of death to just random freezes. Like wtf. This is my 4th gaming laptop and I’ve never had problems with any other brands. Ughhhhh who even writes the other fake reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it for alot of reasons
customer_reviews.text: I'd say it's worth the price. Solid picture quality, fast load times, no framerate drops that I've seen, decent battery life for the power of this laptop, awesome and solid design, decent keyboard, the fan is extremely quiet, and it has surprisingly very amazing sound quality. Usually laptop speakers are compressed and lack in clarity, but the speakers on this Omen pick up almost every different instrument in a song, and can distinguish different sounds without having the different parts melt in to each other. It's solid hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gaming
customer_reviews.text: I use it mostly for work, but I can run Diablo 3, Destiny 2 (on lower settings), and quite a good amount of games on this. full aluminum body helps keep it cool to the touch, and even after long hours of use it only gets a little warm. Key lights are nice and bright, as well is the screen. I actually lower the brightness at night and in the early mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Feels like something that should be much more expensive. The aluminum bottom frame and carbon fiber upper make it very durable. Feels very nice in the hand. Screen has amazing quality and the surround sound speakers sound amazing with a lot of bass for a laptop. Keyboard is comfortable. Touchpad has synaptics drivers. Not the best. The battery life also isn't great. As a college student, I don't leave my room without the charger. Can run any application though, and multitasking never results in problems. The nvme ssd makes it extremely fast and I feel like I don't need any more storage than what I have.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Obonyo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad so far
customer_reviews.text: Temp review based on arrival on time and opening box appeal. Startup was ok, a bunch of drivers and updates needed thay took hours. Painful to recieve a brand new computer and spend hours on startup and updates. Will update this review after have a chance to battle test it. So far it looks pretty solid!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding laptop for price!!
customer_reviews.text: I paid in total about 1,000 dollars on this laptop which is a first for me. All in all i can honestly say it was the best investment i think i have made in a while! Everything booted up perfect out of the box and runs my bigger games perfectly at 80 fps no problem, its a must purchase for anyone looking for a nice portable gaming laptop! Battery life is lacking but makes up for it with performance.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast it is and that you are able to upgrade it. The only thing I noticed is I have filled up 3/4 of the hard drive and only added a few programs and installed World of Warcraft. It has a 1tb hard drive. But, I am very happy with this purchae.
customer_reviews.author: Teric53

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, but faster!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't looking for a huge laptop, like I'd had before with a 17" Alienware, but am truly pleased with the HP Omen. The SSD is a game-changer, in that this boots up and shuts down in seconds. All other performance therein is great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chad S. Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: A near flawless gaming laptop that can double as a stove
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic laptop, well worth the price, this behemoth will run anything and everything you need it to and look badass doing it. The battery Life is fine so long as you’re not doing heavy gaming, if you are, just keep it plugged in. Another thing is that this beast really gets hot, id definitely recommend a cooling pad. Other than that this thing is near flawless. It’s run ARK survival evolved, escape from Tarkov, and Watch Dogs 2 perfectly to name a few of the more demanding games.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: If I can get the lights back on the keyboard on this CPU it would perfect ok
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome CPU the lights went out on the keyboard is there anyway to fix that?hp service helped thank you fn and f4 together
customer_reviews.author: awesomesause

customer_reviews.title: Fresh out the box, awesome! Star Trek Online is great!
customer_reviews.text: See the Performance Mark benchmark tests fresh out the box. No complaints here! Definitely worth the $ for the quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Superb laptop, very fast performance, beautiful design, love the black and red.
customer_reviews.author: PocketAppZ

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.text: I had 3 bluescreens in the first 2 hours of usage, and what a surprise, the laptop automatically throttles your cpu and your gpu at a good ol 30%, and you cannot physically change that throttling unless you download 2 seperate programs to mess with your computer files to unthrottle whatever HP has throttled for you. I cannot believe how bad of an experience i've had with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Really good gaming laptop that i can use whenever im not home, or unable to use the Pc, so far not so many problems, apart from the typical overheating after a couple of hours, but honestly this is expected from a laptop, and i think anybody that really wants to game for hours will buy a cooling pad anyway. So far after a month of usage i have found no problems, and im extremely satisfied with it, 9/10 buy, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Works fine without internet
customer_reviews.text: Received the Omen and it started fine and appeared to work but it started dropping internet connection. Spent over an hour with HP support and replaced firmware and drivers but still drops internet. Other devices on the same router work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Okay - but not for the price
customer_reviews.text: After about a year, its sound drive started acting up and now has uneven sound panning and occasional volume bursts. As it is a hardware issue, there's no software cure for it. It works fine if I feed it through an external speaker however. Seeing as how the laptop was supposed to live up the experience, it is rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pan

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the battery life, drains in an hour with light use, awful shame as I really like it otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hagadorn

customer_reviews.title: Fast processor
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work....very fast startup time.....lots of memory and tons of storage.Also the fact that it's easy to open up and upgrade memory or hard drives......
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: A good reliable computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a computer for a casual gamer, has just the necessary specs to work and play wherever you want. its good for work and do not leave your entertainment at home. It's quite noisy but you get used to it. have enjoyed it and do not regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Perdomo

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. I've been using it for school and photo editing and it has no problem using Photoshop and other systems at the same time. Great laptop for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Minkus

customer_reviews.title: Good quality computer, Battery Life is garbage
customer_reviews.text: The battery Life is short, and the Laptop heats up and is loud any time you start a game or downloading anything. I have recently moved on to a bigger desktop build but the laptop is there for a backup if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane

customer_reviews.title: The battery is not good
customer_reviews.text: The battery is not good at all. It discharges in 3 hours by just connecting to Wifi.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I am a PC gamer and a college student. I bought this laptop originally to do homework but I also like to play PC games. I bought this laptop a little over a year and a half ago and it is still working great! I have had no issues with it. The keyboard lights are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra M.

customer_reviews.title: It died in 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Died in 6 months. No power. Expect a heck of a lot more from a $1000 laptop.
customer_reviews.author: DanB

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well!
customer_reviews.text: Works Just As I Expected I Have Had No Problems With It What So Ever I Really Love It 100%
customer_reviews.author: Esquire Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months. It works great. Starts up fast. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: TD40

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good gaming pc for a budget as well as specific look. I always reccomend HP for a pc whether for web surfing, writing or gaming. Such a nice design and decent specs for playing games on.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: The Hp Omen 15 is a wonderful gaming laptop. Especially for the price. This game can run games on max setting with over 80 fps. The only thing that sucks is the battery life which only last about and hour and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Superfast refresh rate
customer_reviews.text: Gaming labtop, very fast refresh. No lagging. Wonderful to play on. Red backlighting on keys are awesome. No issues. But the memory could be much larger
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence V

customer_reviews.title: I Dont recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but after a year of use the mother board died seems to be a electric static problem affects the 2017 models as well
customer_reviews.author: German Vives

customer_reviews.title: meets specifications
customer_reviews.text: meets specifications but I wish the battery life was longer and it has randomly shut down 4 times and the processor doesn't seem as fast as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I spent a little extra for this one
customer_reviews.text: I am more using this for cad software for programming 3d printer, not so much gaming but I definitely give it a 6/5, no ploblems and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good entry-level gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is perfect, if you don't rely much on battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Sabina

customer_reviews.title: Fast and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons 13th birthday. Probably way more computer than he needed but he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life and runs hot
customer_reviews.text: Battery life isn’t great, but otherwise it’s been a great laptop! I love being able to run my games again!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Samples

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Laptop for Everything!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in 2 days, it's an awesome laptop for the price!! Very satisfied with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David Owen Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Not charging
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop and when i got it, it was not charging. Plugged in it say's (plugged in, not charging) dont understand why.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little hot but for the speed and power it is great for the price. Runs all my games at high settings.
customer_reviews.author: SuperBoB

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I use it for all my gaming needs and have no problem with it
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop for casual gaming and fast performance at this price. Has every feature as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Pawas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice laptop computer
customer_reviews.text: I use for photoshop and make the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Have this to my son for college and he said it works nicely
customer_reviews.author: juan maysonet

product_meta.title: OMEN by HP 15.6-inch Gaming Laptop, i5-8300H Processor, GeForce GTX 1050Ti 4GB, FHD IPS Thin Display, 12GB 2666MHz RAM, 1TB HDD & 128GB PCIE SSD, Windows 10 (15-dc0010nr, Black), Metal
product_meta.description: Play at your best from anywhere -without sacrificing performance. The OMEN 15 gaming Laptop pc keeps you moving and improving, with desktop-class graphics performance, immersion, and upgradability.
feature_bullets: Play the latest games, including Fortnight, PUBG, and Overwatch, from anywhere—without sacrificing performance.
8th Generation intel(r) core(tm) i5-8300H Processor, quad-core, 2.3GHz up to 4.0GHz for top gaming performance.
Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB GDDR5 dedicated). 15.6-Inch diagonal FHD IPS bright View micro-edge WLED-backlit (1920 x 1080) with 144Hz refresh rate.
12 GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM (upgradable with 2 accessible Memory Slots). 128 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD. 1 TB 7200 RPM SATA HDD.
Dragon Red Backlit keyboard, full size directional Arrow keys, and illuminated WASD keys for instant recognition.
Battery life: up to 10 hours and 45 minutes (mixed usage); up to 6 hours and 30 minutes (video playback); up to 5 hours and 30 minutes (wireless streaming).
Dimensions AND weight (unpackaged): 14.17 inches (W) x 10.35 inches (D) x 0.98 inch (H); 5.40 pounds.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars131 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
